post.text: Hillary Clinton is CORRUPT! Crooked only cares about power, money and herself. I am in this for YOU! #AmericaFirst

comment.author: Nicholas
comment.text: Your campaign is despicable!!! Based only in attacking Hillary, you don't have a another subject, you are boring and is only hurting you. You are corrupt crooked Trump too.

replies.author: John
replies.text: Get off this site. Hellary troll.

replies.author: Alyssa
replies.text: she gives so much ammo, why not use it against her .. she's corrupt and she deserves everything he dishes out to her and so much more .. she deserves a life sentence, and not in some cushy prison either ..
